title: Coronavirus and China, 2020 Election
itunes:title: Coronavirus and China, 2020 Election
description:
Guests: Greta Van Susteren, Chief National Political Analyst for Gray Media and Host of Full Court Press with Greta Van Susteren, Guy Snodgrass, CEO of Defense Analytics, former director of communications and chief speechwriter to Secretary of Defense James Mattis and author of “Holding the Line: Inside Trump’s Pentagon with Secretary Mattis,” Jennifer Psaki, Former-Communications Director for the Obama Administration, and Jack Fitzpatrick, Bloomberg Government Congressional reporter. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
